statements: UPDATE inventory_reports SET quantity = 50, price = 15.99 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_reports SET category = 'Electronics', product_name = 'Laptop' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_reports SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = price * 1.1 WHERE id = 100;
UPDATE inventory_reports SET price = 29.99, movement_speed = 'fast', category = 'electronics' WHERE product_name = 'Smartphone';
UPDATE slow_moving_inventory SET quantity = 50, last_sold_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE inventory_id = 123;
UPDATE promotion_targets SET target_discount = 10.5, target_type = 'Holiday' WHERE target_id = 456;
UPDATE slow_moving_inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = price * 1.1 WHERE product_name = 'Widget' AND last_sold_date < '2021-01-01';
UPDATE promotion_targets SET target_discount = target_discount - 2.5 WHERE target_type = 'Seasonal' AND product_name = 'Winter Boots';
UPDATE slow_moving_inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 12345;
UPDATE promotions SET discount = 0.15, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE promotion_id = 98765;
UPDATE promotions SET discount = 10.00, start_date = '2022-05-01' WHERE promotion_id = 101;
UPDATE slow_moving_inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE product_id = 201;
UPDATE slow_moving_inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE promotion_targets SET discount_percentage = 15.00, start_date = '2022-05-10' WHERE promotion_id = 101;
UPDATE slow_moving_inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE promotion_targets SET discount_percentage = 10.75, start_date = '2022-08-15', end_date = '2023-02-28' WHERE promotion_id = 456;
UPDATE slow_moving_inventory SET quantity = 20, unit_price = 15.00 WHERE product_id = 12345;
UPDATE promotions SET discount_amount = 0.10, start_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE promotion_id = 1001;
UPDATE slow_moving_inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5, unit_price = unit_price * 0.9 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE promotions SET discount_amount = 0.15, start_date = '2023-01-01', promotion_name = 'New Year Sale' WHERE promotion_id = 201
